name: Portfolio Web Template 🌐
description:
Creating a website portfolio for your work can be overwhelming. I made my design file open source to help you out. Feel free to download mine and use it for inspiration for your portfolio.


Best of luck! ♥️


🎥 Watch the YT Video: https://youtu.be/7sKu6gfquo8


I coded the website using React and it's live!

Final website: https://www.furquan.me/


The code is open source as well. 🙌
